value.name: Nathaniel Richmond
value.description: 'Shots Fired Right Outside The Window': 911 Calls Released In Ambush Of Ohio JudgeOfficials released the 911 calls today of what investigators say was an ambush attack on a judge outside a ...

value.name: Prosecutor Releases Security Video Of Ohio Judge Being Shot
value.description: The video shows Jefferson County Judge Joseph Bruzzese Jr. being shot outside a courthouse in Steubenville in eastern Ohio in August 2017 by Nathaniel Richmond and then Richmond being killed by a ...

value.name: Gunman killed after shooting Ohio judge
value.description: Police say the gunman, convicted felon Nathaniel Richmond, was killed when the judge and a probation officer returned fire. Jericka Duncan reports.
